name: Piano Master National Anthems
description:
Piano Master is a music game, just follow the notes on the screen and you will be able to play your favorite national anthems.

This is a special version of "Piano Master", dedicated to the national anthems of the countries of the world. It includes 32 songs.

For a better play experience a display size of at least 4 inches is recommended. This program works very well on tablets.

National Anthems in this game:
Italy
United States
France
United Kingdom
Spain
Germany
Japan
Canada
Hungary
South Korea
Brazil
Argentina
Russia
Belgium
Ireland
Ukraine
Sweden
Portugal
Greece
Switzerland
The Netherlands
Austria
Denmark
Norway
Finland
Mexico
Israel
Australia
India
China
Turkey
Pakistan
